titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 7649/49 'Access to Volumes of Lorimer's Gazetteer'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 10; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding a request by Sir Lionel Haworth, former Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, for access to the classified reference work Gazetteer of the Persian Gulf, Oman and Central Arabia(1908) by John Gordon Lorimer. The correspondents are the Foreign Office and the Commonwealth Relations Office.
